Research Themes

Research Themes Projects Researchers Publications Facilities

Signal Processing & Interpretation

Sociodigital Reality (AR, VR, Haptics, Speech and Language Analysis)
Visual Computing (Computer Vision, Visual Forensics, Machine Learning)
Signal Processing for IoT (Predictive Maintenance, Digital Twin, Communication)


Associated Laboratories

  • Signal Processing Lab
  • Image Processing & Computer Vision Lab
  • Multimodal Interaction Lab

Critical-Physical Systems

Multi-agent system
Mechatronics & cyber-physical systems
Robust & optimal control
Adaptive control & robotics
Electric vehicles

Nanoelectronics & Integrated Circuits

Multi-agent system Oxide metal semiconductors by sputtering for sensor applications
2D materials: MoS2, AlGaN/GaN HEMTs
Bandgap engineering and surface studies of semiconductors
Micro and Nano device fabrications
Organic and Flexible Electronics: Field-effect transistors (FETs), Circuits, and Sensors
Electrical characterization, Parameter extraction, Interface characterization
Analog and mixed-signal circuits


Associated Laboratories

  • Microelectronics Lab
  • Electronic Circuit Simulation & VLSI Systems Lab
  • Special Manpower Development Program Lab
  • Flexible Large Area Microelectronics Research Lab
